pr_title: Use packages for the common RESTEasy reflection ignores and add the JSON packages to DEFAULT_IGNORED_PACKAGES

timeline.bodyText: This one is missing, it's on the javax.ws.rs.container package, not on javax.ws.rs.core
timeline.author: jorsol

timeline.message:
Use packages for the common RESTEasy reflection ignores

We used to add classes one at a time but in all those cases, adding the
whole package makes more sense as everything will be handled by RESTEasy
and specific (de)serializers.

timeline.bodyText: Wondering if we could provide a config item for user to build this list up by themselves? Of course we can have good defaults, but we have been adding classes/ packages on a continual basis here.
timeline.author: machi1990

replies.bodyText: Yeah, so I kinda agree. What makes me hesitant is that I fear they won't report these things anymore, thus we would have a bad experience for new users.
replies.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText: Yes, but new users will ran into these warnings and report them anyway. We could either add the configuration key to the warning message to make the experience even better or once the issue is reported see if we need to review the "default values" or something more refined need to be done.
replies.author: machi1990
